pages.text: $(l)Leather Armor Piece$() is an item $(l:new_content/recipes/leather_armor)used to craft Leather Armor instead of using Leather$(). $(br2)You can get it by breaking $(l:new_content/blocks/full_blocks/wooden_crate)Wooden Crates$() and by killing $(l:new_content/entities/leatherling)Leatherlings$().
